title: Rainy city street driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: A green car drives down a rainy city street, with a large building in the background.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain control on the wet road.
